module.name: alliedwallet
module.description: Accept credit and debit cards online with Allied Wallet. You'll be able to accept 164 different currencies around the globe with the safety and security of our PCI Level 1 compliance and our proprietary fraud scrub. You’ll have 24 hour customer support and a state-of-the-art payment gateway to track your transactions all for a rate as low as 1.94%.
module.author: PrestaShop
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to delete your details?
